testcase.name: test_conversion_error

failure.message: "Pandoc died with exitcode "6" during conversion: Unknown option --blah" does not match "Pandoc died with exitcode "2" during conversion: Unknown option --blah. Try pandoc --help for more information. "

testcase.failure:
RuntimeError: Pandoc died with exitcode "2" during conversion: Unknown option --blah. Try pandoc --help for more information.
